ygData.subject: Re: Discrete Neural Networks
ygData.msgSnippet: Just wanna clarify things. The inputs & outputs to the neural network is always 1 bit in this test. What I meant below is that you can choose how many inputs

Just wanna clarify things. The inputs & outputs to the neural network is =
always 1 bit in this test. What I meant below is that you can choose how ma=
ny inputs to use for one variable. For example the light angle can use five=
 inputs if you wan't.

There is that nasty ASSERT(visited[i]) bug in the co=
de again. I reintroduced it with the enable patch I think. I will hunt it d=
own. Meanwhile maybe it is possible to comment out that ASSERT(). All nodes=
 should be visited of course, but maybe it is not necessary for the moment.=


/Magnus

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "torvhydda" <torvhydda@...> wrote:
=

> In eco.c (LINE 30 - 39) one can experiment with how many bits each input=
 & output has.
